TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit BiometricPrompt extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: A class that manages a system-provided biometric dialog.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Gets the type(s) of authenticators that may be invoked by the prompt to authenticate the user, as set by .
Docs.value: A bit field representing the type(s) of authenticators that may be invoked by the prompt (as defined by ), or 0 if this field was not set.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void Authenticate (Android.OS.CancellationSignal cancel, Java.Util.Concurrent.IExecutor executor, Android.Hardware.Biometrics.BiometricPrompt.AuthenticationCallback callback);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Authenticate(class Android.OS.CancellationSignal cancel, class Java.Util.Concurrent.IExecutor executor, class Android.Hardware.Biometrics.BiometricPrompt/AuthenticationCallback callback) cil managed

Docs.param: An object that can be used to cancel authentication.
An executor to handle callback events.
An object to receive authentication events.
Docs.summary: This call warms up the biometric hardware, displays a system-provided dialog, and starts scanning for a biometric.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: If any argument is null, or if the allowed biometric authenticator strength is explicitly set to . Prior to , this exception is also thrown if was explicitly set to true.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void Authenticate (Android.Hardware.Biometrics.BiometricPrompt.CryptoObject crypto, Android.OS.CancellationSignal cancel, Java.Util.Concurrent.IExecutor executor, Android.Hardware.Biometrics.BiometricPrompt.AuthenticationCallback callback);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Authenticate(class Android.Hardware.Biometrics.BiometricPrompt/CryptoObject crypto, class Android.OS.CancellationSignal cancel, class Java.Util.Concurrent.IExecutor executor, class Android.Hardware.Biometrics.BiometricPrompt/AuthenticationCallback callback) cil managed

Docs.param: A cryptographic operation to be unlocked after successful authentication.
An object that can be used to cancel authentication.
An executor to handle callback events.
An object to receive authentication events.
Docs.summary: This call warms up the biometric hardware, displays a system-provided dialog, and starts scanning for a biometric.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: If any argument is null, or if the allowed biometric authenticator strength is explicitly set to . Prior to , this exception is also thrown if was explicitly set to true.

Docs.summary: Gets the description for the prompt, as set by .
Docs.value: The description for the prompt, or null if the prompt has no description.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Determines if explicit user confirmation is required by the prompt, as set by .
Docs.value: true if explicit user confirmation is required, or false otherwise.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Gets the negative button text for the prompt, as set by .
Docs.value: The negative button text for the prompt, or null if no negative button text was set.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Gets the subtitle for the prompt, as set by .
Docs.value: The subtitle for the prompt, or null if the prompt has no subtitle.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Gets the title for the prompt, as set by .
Docs.value: The title of the prompt, which is guaranteed to be non-null.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
